data.fullContent: Nigeria was ranked 21st in the world in terms of GDP (PPP) in 2015. Nigeria is the United States ' largest trading partner in sub-Saharan Africa and supplies a fifth of its oil ( 11 % of oil imports ). It has the seventh-largest trade surplus with the U.S. of any country worldwide. Nigeria is the 50th-largest export market for U.S. goods and the 14th-largest exporter of goods to the U.S. The United States is the country's largest foreign investor.
data.answer: 2015年，尼日利亚的GDP(购买力平价)排名世界第21位。尼日利亚是美国在撒哈拉以南非洲地区最大的贸易伙伴，供应美国五分之一的石油(占美国石油进口的11%)。中国对美国的贸易顺差在世界各国中排名第七。尼日利亚是美国第50大商品出口市场，也是美国第14大商品出口国。美国是尼日利亚最大的外国投资者。
